title: NPR Morning Edition
description: Featured on NPR's Morning Edition arguing that overly strict SEC auditing requirements would place "too big a financial burden" on startups and could "limit the rate we're able to domestically innovate and create jobs." While promoting the need for consumer protections and privacy rights.

title: CCTV International
description: International television interview discussing crowdfunding innovation, global market trends, and the democratization of access to capital for entrepreneurs worldwide.
